Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to sanitation services provided to the New York city housing authority
Summary: Relates to sanitation services provided to the New York city housing authority; provides notwithstanding the provisions of section 16-114 of the administrative code of the city of New York, the New York city housing authority shall not be required to pay for sanitation services provided by the sanitation department of the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to sanitation services provided to the New York city housing authority
